data.name: Cross of Auria - Yuelslain's Village
data.detailed_description:
Yuelslain's Village is Cross of Auria's first free content DLC with challenges in the level 50 range.

This content pack includes:
• Access to Yuelslain's Village from a rift in the Veil. Comes complete with NPCs, a questline, exclusive enemies in random battles, and new gear sets on the loot table of the area.

Minimum in-game requirements:
• Ruby must be able to access the Veil at will from anywhere in the world.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Graphics: Any modern GPU
  • Sound Card: Any modern sound card.
  • Additional Notes: Any modern PC will do.
